definition: surname Long/short for 吉隆坡[Ji2 long2 po1], Kuala Lumpur

sentences.english: Even in the midst of winter, she finds spring.
sentences.chinese: 即使是在隆冬，她也能找到春天。

sentences.english: It's the middle of winter right now  and it's beautiful outside.
sentences.chinese: 現在是隆冬，但外面卻依然很美。

sentences.english: It is winter and Dhaka is full of lights.
sentences.chinese: 隆冬時節的達卡燈火通明。

sentences.english: There can be no east wind in the dead of winter.
sentences.chinese: 隆冬之時，怎得東南風乎？

sentences.english: It was the dead of winter, severely cold. Dense clouds covered the sky.
sentences.chinese: 時值隆冬，天氣嚴寒，彤雲密佈。

sentences.english: Three of my four daughters were born in the dead of winter.
sentences.chinese: 我生的四個女兒中，有三個是在隆冬出生的。

sentences.english: In deep winter, Hom is covered by heavy snow.
sentences.chinese: 隆冬，被厚厚積雪所覆蓋的禾木，更顯得神祕與安靜。

sentences.english: Roses need speciing care so th support they can live through winter.
sentences.chinese: 玫瑰必要特殊的幫襯以便它們可以活過隆冬。

definition: cold weather, frozen ground (idiom); bitterly cold
The north wind is icy cold.
nine periods of nine days each after winter solstice, the coldest time of the year
Lidong or Start of Winter, 19th of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st November
a world of ice and snow
nine periods of nine days each after winter solstice, the coldest time of the year
Daxue or Great Snow, 21st of the 24 solar terms 二十四節氣|二十四节气 7th-21st December
